pageContent: Objective: To improve and individualise estimates of treatment outcomes for men diagnosed with prostate cancer, we examined the impact of baseline comorbidity on health-related quality of life (HRQL) outcomes in an analysis of two pooled, prospective cohort studies.

metaData.source:
Sexual functioning in patients with localized prostate cancer awaiting treatment
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/11441519/
